text: Tapa'i bhannus ki ke ma allaha baheka aru palanakarta khojum ? Jaba ki uhi pratyeka kurako malika ho. Ra jasale je karma gardacha, tyasako hani noksani tyasaila'i nai huncha. Ra kasaile kasaiko papako bhari bokne chaina, ani timi sabaila'i aphno palanakartache'u nai pharkera januparne cha. Ani usale timiharule utha'ekai pratyeka vivadako barema timiharu samu khulasta parnecha
